title: Request vote messages are lost during split
body:
## Bug Report

Request vote messages are lost during split. 99.999% latency is up to 15s.

https://github.com/tikv/tikv/blob/ae7a6ecee6e3367da016df0293a9ffe9cc2b5705/components/raftstore/src/store/fsm/store.rs#L1567-L1571

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->

master branch.

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->

sysbench oltp_write.
